languages.text: "Это... не так. Проклятый гемункулкул слил воедино не только тела провидцев, но и их мысли и души. Они все еще там... Страдают, раздираемые на куски собственными и чужими воспоминаниями. Но я чувствую, как тень Той, Что Жаждет подкрадывается все ближе, чтобы пожрать их и навсегда стереть из этого мира. Я не могу этого допустить".

traits.locale_text: "Это... не так. Проклятый гемункулкул слил воедино не только тела провидцев, но и их мысли и души. Они все еще там... Страдают, раздираемые на куски собственными и чужими воспоминаниями. Но я чувствую, как тень Той, Что Жаждет, подкрадывается все ближе, чтобы пожрать их и навсегда стереть из этого мира. Я не могу этого допустить".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."
languages.original_text: "Это... не так. Проклятый гемункулкул слил воедино не только тела провидцев, но и их мысли и души. Они все еще там... Я не могу этого допустить".

Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Eso... no es cierto. Ese condenado hemónculo no solo ha fusionado los cuerpos de los videntes, sino también sus almas. Aún siguen dentro... sufriendo una indecible agonía. Desgarrados por sus recuerdos, tanto propios como ajenos. Pero puedo sentir la sombra de la Sedienta deslizándose hacia ellas para devorarlas y borrarlas de este mundo para siempre. No puedo permitir que eso ocurra».
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: «Eso... no es cierto. Ese condenado hemónculo no solo ha fusionado los cuerpos de los videntes, sino también sus almas. Aún siguen dentro... sufriendo una indecible agonía. Desgarrados por sus recuerdos, tanto propios como ajenos. Pero puedo sentir la sombra de la Sedienta deslizándose hacia ellas para devorarlas y borrarlas de este mundo para siempre. No puedo permitir que eso ocurra».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それは…違う。呪われしハモンキュラスは先見司たちの肉体だけでなく、魂をも融合させたのだ。彼らはまだ中にいる…苦しみながらな。自分や他者の記憶によって引き裂かれている。そしてそんな彼らを喰らい尽くし、この惑星から永遠に葬り去ろうとどんどん忍び寄ってきているかの渇きたる女の影を我は感じるのだ。だがそんなことはさせない」
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: 「それは…違う。呪われしハモンキュラスは先見司たちの肉体だけでなく、魂をも融合させたのだ。彼らはまだ中にいる…苦しみながらな。自分や他者の記憶によって引き裂かれている。そしてそんな彼らを喰らい尽くし、この惑星から永遠に葬り去ろうとどんどん忍び寄ってきているかの渇きたる女の影を我は感じるのだ。だがそんなことはさせない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “并非……如此，那个该死的血伶人不仅融合把先知的身体融合在一起，还融合了他们的灵魂。他们还在里面……受苦，被他们自己的记忆和别人的记忆撕扯成了碎片！我能感觉到饥渴女士的影子愈来愈近，她渴望吞噬他们，把他们从这个世界上永远抹除。我绝不允许这种事情发生。”
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: “并非……如此，那个该死的血伶人不仅融合把先知的身体融合在一起，还融合了他们的灵魂。他们还在里面……受苦，被他们自己的记忆和别人的记忆撕扯成了碎片！我能感觉到饥渴女士的影子愈来愈近，她渴望吞噬他们，把他们从这个世界上永远抹除。我绝不允许这种事情发生。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ce... n'est pas vrai. Ce maudit hémoncule n'a pas fusionné que leurs corps, mais leurs âmes également. Ils sont encore là... et ils souffrent. Écartelés par leurs propres souvenirs et ceux des autres. Mais je sens l'ombre de l'Assoiffée s'approcher toujours plus près, prête à les dévorer et à les faire disparaître de ce monde pour toujours. Je dois l'en empêcher. »
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: « Ce... n'est pas vrai. Ce maudit hémoncule n'a pas fusionné que leurs corps, mais leurs âmes également. Ils sont encore là... et ils souffrent. Écartelés par leurs propres souvenirs et ceux des autres. Mais je sens l'ombre de l'Assoiffée s'approcher toujours plus près, prête à les dévorer et à les faire disparaître de ce monde pour toujours. Je dois l'en empêcher. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das ... stimmt nicht. Der verfluchte Haemonculus hat nicht nur die Körper der Runenpropheten verschmolzen, sondern auch ihre Seelen. Sie befinden sich immer noch darin ... und sie leiden. Zerrissen von Erinnerungen, ihren eigenen und die von anderen. Aber ich spüre, wie sich der Schatten von Ihr, die dürstet, heranschleicht, um sie zu verschlingen und sie für immer vergessen zu machen. Ich kann das nicht zulassen."
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: "Das ... stimmt nicht. Der verfluchte Haemonculus hat nicht nur die Körper der Runenpropheten verschmolzen, sondern auch ihre Seelen. Sie befinden sich immer noch darin ... und sie leiden. Zerrissen von Erinnerungen, ihren eigenen und die von anderen. Aber ich spüre, wie sich der Schatten von Ihr, die dürstet, heranschleicht, um sie zu verschlingen und sie für immer vergessen zu machen. Ich kann das nicht zulassen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır... Yanılıyorsun. Kahrolası Haimonkulus, Ötesezenlerin bedenleri gibi ruhlarını da birleştirmiş. Hâlâ oradalar... Izdırap içindeler... Hem kendilerine hem de başkalarına ait hatıralarla paralanıyorlar. Susayan'ın gölgesi, onları tüketip bu dünyadan ebediyen silmek üzere gitgide yaklaşıyor. Buna müsaade edemem."
languages.original_text: "That... is not so. The accursed Haemonculus has merged not just the Farseers' bodies, but their souls as well. They are still inside... in agony. Torn to pieces by memories, their own and others'. But I can sense the shadow of She Who Thirsts creeping ever closer, to devour them and erase them from this world forever. I cannot let that happen."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır... Yanılıyorsun. Kahrolası Haimonkulus, Ötesezenlerin yalnızca bedenlerini değil, ruhlarını da birleştirmiş. Hâlâ oradalar... Izdırap içindeler... Hem kendilerine hem de başkalarına ait hatıralarla paramparça olmuşlar. Onları tüketip bu dünyadan ebediyen silmek için Susayan'ın gölgesinin gittikçe daha da yaklaştığını hissedebiliyorum. Buna müsaade edemem."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
